content: Ravish Kumar of age 22 years.The symptoms you are having are running nose,fever,whooping cough.The diagnosis report shows that you have the symptoms of malaria and acute bronchitis.The prescribed medicine you have to take are Azithromycin 500 mg once a day for 3 days,Robitussin 5 ml thrice a day for 5 days.You should do more Exercise.You shouldn’t drink so much beer.
